Welcome to dbpool-python's documentation!
=========================================

Enhance mysql-connector-python pooling.

Inspired by Java tomcat-jdbc-pool.

Based on oracle mysql-connector-python.


Features
--------

- Support min_idle and max_idle.
- Support max_age database connection.
- Support health check for database connection.

Install
-------


.. code-block:: bash

   pip3 install dbpool
